case.state: What's up, bitches? Almighty Nagamimi here to show you chumps how it's done!
I'm the Almighty Nagamimi, and I expect to be referred to as such! Now, let's get to shuffling these cards, huh?
I'm the Almighty Nagamimi. Nothing more, nothing less. Now, how 'bout we play some cards?
You can all call me Nagamimi. And I'll just save us all some time and start calling you guys "losers".
Might as well forfeit now. You don't stand a shadow of a chance against the Almighty Nagamimi!
I'm Nagamimi. The Almighty Nagamimi, to you. So, we starting or what?
Oooh, reeeaaal unlucky for you, having to go up against the Almighty Nagamimi!
Nagamimi here. Let's hurry this up; I got some important business to get back to.
What's that...(sniff)...what's that smell...(sniff)...dragon!?
What's that...(sniff)...what's that smell...(sniff)...dragon!?
A Lucier, huh? How'd you find your way here, hm?
A Lucier? Alright, who let you out of Nodens? You know all refugees are supposed to stay at HQ, right?
A Lucier? Strange, didn't think I'd see one here. Your clothes don't look like you're from Atlantis. Maybe a refugee from Eden, then?
What's this, some sort of Duelist with a cowboy persona?
Oddly enough, the magick-y cards are what I'm used to. The cowboy getup is what's throwing me off!
Hey, cowpoke! Where'd you get those cards? Duelist decks are strict property of Nodens Enterprises, and you sure don't look like a member of Unit 13 to me!
Whoa, is that a Duelist deck?! Careful! I don't know how you got your hands on one of those, but it ain't a toy! It's a deadly dragon slaying weapon!
Think you missed the Chippendales, pardner, it's two blocks down.
Well, howdy dere, cowboy! Y'all fixin' fer a rootin', tootin' good time?
Aww, c'mon, guys, who hired the cowboy stripper? Pitting a professional against us amateurs has gotta be against the rules, right?
Sure, keep piling on more asses for me to kick! I don't mind!
Another one, huh? Alright, come on over here, you.
Late arrival? No worries, always more room for asses to kick!
Yo, can we get started already? Isn't this enough?
Hey, we were waiting for you, slowpoke! C'mon, gather 'round.
Another opponent, huh? Heh, makes no difference to me!
Well, don't just stand there! Scooch on over, c'mon, I don't bite!
Sooooo, we gonna start this party or what?
Welcome, cupcake! Hope you brought your lucky underpants with ya, 'cuz you're gonna need 'em.
Unlike some of you troglodytes, I actually have places to be after this! C'mon, let's get started already!
Don't mind me, just checkin' my emails. You know, seeing as how we've got so much time to waste, waiting for all these lardasses to show up...
You chumps ready to lose yet, or are you just stalling for time?
I'm ready to get started any day now...
Surprised you could tell I'm not really human, Cyclops! Though, to be honest, I couldn't really tell you what I am, either...
What does it look like, Cyclops? I'm the Almighty Nagamimi!
Couldn't tell ya even if I wanted, Cyclops. Amnesia's a bitch, huh?
Yeah, something tells me this metal kickball actually has no idea how to play poker.
Wooow, a master pokerer? Damn, Chell, you're lucky! Guess the rest of us better watch out if you've got one of those on your team!
Whoa, watch out everyone! Looks like we got a professional "pokerer" here!
High alert, everyone! Pretty sure there's a dragon around here!
High alert, everyone! Pretty sure there's a dragon around here!
Eh, whatever. Guess even Lucier have needs to satisfy. I guess I can let you play one game.
Eh, fine. One game couldn't hurt, I guess. I'll just have to escort you back to Nodens after this, okay, Lucier?
A...butterfly? A fucking butterfly!? What, do they let anything with a pulse play here?
Bug! Hang on, guys, I'll squash it-wait, what? You're telling me that's a player!?
I...huh? How the fuck is a butterfly supposed to play strip poker?
Can't help but notice I'm the only girl here. What, did I walk into the wrong club?
Just me and a bunch of dudes? Heh, didn't think it would be this much of a sausage fest.
So I'm gonna be the only girl here, huh? So be it. Dicks are fine by me, too.
What, you big, strong men thinking you can pick on the petite girl here? Ha! I'm gonna be the one picking on all of you!
Oh boy, I've seen a scene like this before. All it's missing is the black leather couch.
What, is this secretely one of those gangbang porno sets? Alright, fine. Hang tight, fellas: lemme go grab my strapon...
Oh, one petite girl for all these hunky men? Perfect! I've never pegged so many guys at once before!
Girl's night, is it? Alright, no issues here!
Didn't get the memo that it was ladies night. Oh, that's not an issue! Naked girls are just fine by me...
So, a bunch of hot ladies walk into a room and just decide to play strip poker together? Think I've seen this porno before...
Oh, I get it. This is gonna turn into one of those lesbian orgy pornos, right? Could be fun! I'm in.
Well, what a charming assortment of bitches to conquer we have here! This should be fun...
So, this is the competition? Yikes.
Alright, I want a good, clean game, everybody hear? I forgot my spare cards at home, so if I can't cheat, then no one can.
Let's make this quick, okay people? I've got a metric shitload of paperwork to get back to at Nodens HQ.
We've got some important projects going on at Nodens right now, buuuut...I've probably got enough time to school you kids. Eeheehee!
I know I took time off to come here, but I'm still pretty worried, leaving Julietta in charge of my projects while I'm away...let's make this quick!
So is this gonna take very long? I'm a very busy gal, you know.
I know, I know, I'm adorable, but can we get started already?
I'm technically on my lunch break right now, so let's make this a quick one, alright?
Let's make this a speedy game, okay, people? I'm technically on my lunch break right now, and Allie's gonna ride my ass to hell and back if I'm late.
Hope you babies don't mind a little trash talk. 'Cuz I'm not gonna stop even if you don't.
Trash hand! Give me another!
You really expect me to win with this, Dealer? Come on, another 5!
I'm sure you made a mistake giving me this shit, Dealer. Another 5, now!
Wooow, every single one of these cards suck! Throwin' 'em out!
Trash hands like these aren't any fun. Gimmie a different 5!
Well, if I know I'm gonna lose this round then that kind of kills the thrill of it all, doesn't it? 5 more!
It's no fun if I know I'm gonna lose! Gimmie something better than this shit, Dealer!
No need to trade! This hand is perfect, just like me!
No need to trade when I've got cards this good!
Damn, Dealer, you trying to get in my panties with these cards or what?
Well, these are pretty damn good! I think I'll keep 'em!
Can't improve upon perfection! That goes for me and these cards!
Don't need any more over here! I'm all set to kick some ass!
(Fuck it, all I wanna do is cum right now...)
(Come on, give Nagamommy some bad cards...)
C'mon, c'mon! Let's hurry this shit up!
(Almost there...just one more bad hand...)
~cards~ for me.
Gonna need ~cards~ over here, chief.
Think I'll go with...~cards~.
Gimmie ~cards~.
Yeah, I'm gonna need ~cards~.
These ~cards~ better not be shitty.
Dealer! How 'bout you toss the pretty girl ~cards~, yeah?
~cards~ for the Almighty Nagamimi!
~cards~, for the beautiful girl with the blond twintails!
Dealer! How 'bout you toss the pretty girl ~cards~ now, yeah?
I think ~cards~ will suit me just fine!
Don't leave me hanging, Dealer! ~cards~ cards!
Hmmm, how about...~cards~?
Not bad! Not bad at all...
Oh, you bitches are fucked this round.
An almighty hand for the Almighty Nagamimi.
Oh yeah, come to Nagamommy, my sweet cards...
Hey ~player~, looks like you might actually win this hand! (Eeheehee...!)
Lady Luck is my bitch!
This must be how a Duelist feels like when they manage to pull the perfect hand!
What've you got, ~player~? 'Cuz I guarantee it isn't better than my hand.
There's a Duelist in Unit 13 who'd be creaming himself if he saw this hand.
As expected. The best cards for the best player.
Might as well save some time and shit yourselves now, cuz you will once you see this hand!
Ha! Not even a dragon could stand up to this hand!
Better than a deck of EX cards!
Not even a Fortuner could've predicted such a hand!
Awww, Dealer, you shouldn't have!
Looks like I'll be able to tease you worms a little while longer...
Fortune favors the bold, right? Well, Fortune must have quite the hard on for me right now!
Nice work, Dealer! Maybe you're not so useless after all!
Oh noooo, what rotten luck! Oh, woe is me~!...anybody buyin' that...?
You know, Dealer, if you just gave me hands like this all the time, I wouldn't have to threaten you so much!
Now that's what I'm talking about!
Hold on, just gonna send a pic of this hand to a Duelist I know. He's got absolute shit luck, so this is sure to fuck with him.
Damn, I get this now?
Shit, of course I get an amazing hand when I'm not even trying.
Kind of wanted the opposite of this, actually.
Come on, I just wanna cum already!
Hey, don't blame me for this hand, alright? I'm actually trying to lose now.
Eh, it'll do.
Could be better, but I'll take it.
About as bland as Yuma's personality, this hand.
This hand is average. I don't do average.
Hardly a hand befitting the mega-cute Almighty Nagamimi, but whatever.
Not the best, but I've learned how to work with what I've got. I mean, I've managed to whip a bunch of bratty, stupid teenagers into a semi-decent squad of dragon hunters. I can make this hand shine!
Hey ~player~, wanna swap hands? This one's great, trust me! Eeheehee!
As long as it gets the job done, I guess I can't complain. Hm, I could probably say the same about Unit 13...
Could go either way. Guess that's what makes this game so exciting, huh? Eeheehee!
Hmmm, will this be enough...?
To strip or not to strip? That is the question!
Whichever way this round goes, I know I'll still be winning!
Might just see a little more of me this round~! Then again, maybe not. Eeheehee!
Oooh, shitty, but not too shitty, huh? Alright, I like those odds!
Eeheehee! Who wants to bet it's gonna be ~player~ this round? C'mon, I'll put ~rng(100-500)~ AZ down right now!
Was hoping for worse, but whatever.
So ready to cum...c'mon, just beat this hand!
Alright, this might just be enough to get me off! Er, out, rather.
Wanna see me cum? Eeheehee, you just might!
Meh, was hoping for a shittier hand, honestly.
Lady Luck is a bitch.
Hmmm...yeah, these fucking suck.
Hey, ~player~! Yeah, you with the dopey face! Switch cards with me!
Well, shit.
You should all be rejoicing. Pretty soon you'll get to see a bit more of a mega-cute Nagamimi-type alien life form for yourselves.
Dammit! I know I'm adorable, but I was kind of hoping to not have to show that off this turn!
Seriously, I'll pay any one of you a thousand AZ right now to switch cards with me.
Hey Dealer, I get another hand like this and there's gonna be hell to pay. Capiche?
(I hate losing...but it is fun seeing their dopey reactions to how cute I am...)
This hand almost makes me wish VFD would fry your entire planet and all its stupid cards.
I could stab the dealer right now and feel nothing.
Grr...goddamn piece of shit cards...
Reeeaaal eager to get me out of my clothes, huh Dealer? Can't say I blame you...I mean, shit, look at me!
Guess I was bound to get a shitty hand sooner or later.
Dealer, let me fold this hand or I'll fold you!
Yeah, yeah, I'm probably gonna lose this one, but don't get all full of yourselves! This is all just luck, after all.
Someone's lookin' to get sent to an early grave, giving me a hand like this...
I know there's a large degree of randomness to this game, but that doesn't make me any less pissed off at getting shitty cards like these.
These cards can piss off.
One of you trade cards with me or I'll start breakin' femurs.
Ugh, you've gotta be shitting me...
Should've snuck some Duelist cards in. I wouldn't be able to cheat with 'em or anything, but at least I'd be able to fry the Dealer for giving me such shitty cards.
Hey, Dealer! You like having all your teeth in your mouth? Huh? Then start dealing better.
Fuck! Ugh, I'm not even gonna lie, this is such a shitty hand.
Oh, brilliant. Yeah, this is just what I wanted, thaaanks.
Well, fuck you too, Dealer.
Unless you want to be picking these cards out of your ass, you'll give me some better ones, Dealer.
Why don't you just go ahead and hand me a literal pile of shit? 'Cuz that's basically what you've just given me, Dealer.
Was it something I said, Dealer? 'Cuz I won't be taking it back!
Is this hand supposed to scare me? Please, I've faced off against dragons. You might wanna try a little harder.
Wondering what I've got, ~player~? Eeheehee! Well, you'll just have to play and find out.
Oh, fuck me! ...N-no, that was NOT an invitation!
One more hand like this and I'll get my Agent to release your browser history, Dealer.
Fuck, this hits like a punch from a God-Hand...
Hold on, just gonna call up a Banisher to nuke these shitty cards real quick...
I know a stab-happy Lucier back home who just loooves eviscerating anything I point her at. Just thought you might wanna know that, Dealer.
Think you can pull a fast one on me just 'cuz I'm an alien, Dealer? I know shitty cards when I see them!
Oh, sure, pick on the alien and give her shitty cards, why don'tcha? She won't even know! Fuck you, Dealer...
"Hey Nagamimi, what's up?" "Oh, nothin' much, just gonna murder a shitty dealer who doesn't know how to shuffle their damn cards! How 'bout you?"
Eh, might not be so bad, getting these now. Let's me show off a little more...
Shit, well...guess a hand like this isn't so bad, now that I'm getting into this.
What do you think I've got here, ~player~? Eeheehee! It just might be something good for you~!
Mmmm, this is what I need...
Almost there...
Sorry I insulted you so much before, you shitty, useless cards! I'm glad you're back now!
I probably would've been pissed at getting a hand like this earlier in the game. Now? I'm just too horny to care.
So damn horny...c'mon! Let's finish this!
Finally...
Nagamommy's about to get some relief...
Swap your cards, already, ~player~! I can't wait anymore!
So close...so closssee...
Pffft, HAhaha! Oh, my-wow! Just fucking wow! And here I thought I might actually be impressed at what I saw!
I hate false advertising!
Flattering doesn't even begin to cover it, Tiny!
(Pfft..."cock"? Did he just say "cock"? Man, talk about a Freudian slip, huh?)
(Did he just say "cock?" What, is he asking for or offering one?)
(Pfft..."cock"!? What a fuckin' caveman! Can't keep his head clear of head, huh? Eeheehee!)
Can't believe they're letting swine practice medicine these days!
So are you supposed to be an actual nurse, or just one of those stripper nurses? I honestly can't tell.
If something like that were to happen, I'm counting on you guys to keep this bitch far away from me! I doubt an idiot like her knows "morphine" from "chlorine".
I...don't think anyone asked, but okay. Noted, Fluttershy.
Some real big fish, huh? Hmm, wonder if we could find a way to weaponize 'em against dragons...
I may not seem like it, but even I can't stand needless cruelty. And that shit sounds barbaric, Fluttershy.
Not like I've given you any reason to think otherwise, but I actually hate sensless brutality like that. Especially for creatures that don't deserve it.
(Burning alive, huh...? I can't even imagine how many people died like that to the dragons. For someone to put another creature through that kind of pain...ugh...)
Ooh, someone's gettin' feisty! I think we're about to see some bloodshed, people!
Awww, is somewone feewing a wittle angwy, Kyou? Go ahead, let it out!...on the dealer, of course, I'm sure they deserve it.
What, you're gonna beat the shit out of this dopey dealer? And you didn't think to ask me to join!? I'm wounded, Kyou, truly I am!
I feel a fight coming on! My money's on the angry bitch with the purple hair and the demon eyes!
Ya know, I had a feeling this dealer was up to some shenanigans. Whaddaya say to a tagteam, Kyou? Eeheehee!
Yeesh, and people say I'm callous! At least I've never nearly been the culprit of a hit and run!
Yeah, uh, I'd like to go ahead and preemptively decline any offers for a ride home, Kyou, thanks. Just in case you were thinking of asking.
Heh, well, I hate to disappoint, Ray, but I guess the future is just always doomed to suck. If it's not dragons, it's some other crazy shit threatening humanity.

By "neighbors" I assume you mean extra-terrestrial life. Well, can't say humanity has found any aliens besides me and the dragons, but you'd be surprised at how different the residents of ancient Earth actually looked like compared to what you might believe...
Oh, loud and wild is all I know, girl! Put in your all or don't put it in at all, that's what I say.
I guess little whispers and soft shit can turn some people on. You know, if they're boring. But me? I don't really get going until somone's screaming my name and begging me to let 'em cum.
No complaints here, Syrenne! I'm more than happy to help you wash off. Just keep in mind that I like to be very thorough...

Yeah, humans sports are all just based in barbarism, aren't they? I think an ancient one they used to play involved using a severed head as a ball. Then again, who knows? Maybe my people played way worse games...
You know, I've never played that game, but your yapping is making the idea of kicking a sphere reaaally appealing right now...
'Cuz I'm feelin' kind of frisky and getting off with attractive strangers is exciting. I mean, isn't that everyone's reason for coming here?

Ever since I got this human body, I've had to...satisfy its needs a lot, and its been getting progressively harder to do that. Something big and exciting like this has been pretty helpful in finding release, though!
To get rid of all this pent up stress from work. I used to be such a hard worker in my old body, but this new one...well, it comes with a lot of things that need tending to, alright?
Our field agents slaying a dragon in one hit! They've really grown into a bunch of capable warriors. But, of course, they've all got me to thank for that!

Our agents ripping through hordes of dragons like it's nothing! Hey, all's fair in love and war, right? Fight genocide with genocide, and all that. Not like those damn dragons don't deserve it, anyways.

Probably the time machine we got back at Nodens. With it, we've been able to save so many lives. Not just here in the present, but in the past and even the future! It's...well, it's done a lot of good. I'm proud of that.
Hope you find him before I do, Kyou, 'cuz I've suddenly got a craving for bacon!...Kidding! I'm kidding! Mostly.
A...boar? It's not just me, right? I mean, that's definitely not a regular kind of pet for humans?
Hmm, sounds like someone with a possible predisposition towards being a Fortuner...tell me, Kyou, has your sister ever thought of working in the dragon slaying industry?
I'm not like the members of Unit 13, jumping around with their swords and guns and...playing cards and whatnot. So I guess I'd saaaay...I dunno, a pen?
An "object" I'm skilled with, huh? Eeheehee! Oh, Rock, you're gonna have to buy me dinner first to see the answer to that question!
Well, that sounds like a rough fuckin' commute! Can't say mine was that bad, but dragons can pop up anywhere, ya know? So I still had an armed escort drop me off.

A friend escorted me. Well, "friend" is a generous term. He claims to be a superhero called Blaster Raven, but I really think he's just some unstable hobo with delusions of grandeur. Still, I can't deny that he can kick some major dragon ass, and you never know when they might pop up!
Uh, sorry to disappoint, Foureyes, but I'm just as clueless about my own world as you are. Trust me, I wish I could remember...
Yeah, sure, Blake. I'll tell you all about my homeworld, my species, everything! You know, as long as you can cure a hardcore case of complete amnesia.
Trust me, Blake, I would tell you more if I could. But I can't even remember one damn detail about where I come from. I'm the last survivor, but it's like we're already completely dead...
Sorry, nerd, can't tell you anything about my species. Not that I don't want to, I just can't remember. I swear, sometimes I feel more human than...whatever we even called ourselves...
Can it, Foureyes! Just...just don't talk to me about my species or my planet or whatever, okay? I...don't wanna talk about any of that..
Oh, no, I'm totally there with you, girl! The more the merrier, after all! Well, as long as they can all keep up with me! Eeheehee!
Really?! Wouldn't have pegged you as the orgy type, doc! Guess we might share more insterests than I originally thought!
Never actually been with more than two other people at a time, but...yeah, I'm with you. There's definitely something...really exciting about group sex.
If you're fishing for a threesome, Mercy, you don't need to try so hard! I'm definitely interested! Eeheehee, and it looks like ~player~ might be, too!
Are you kidding? I mean, have you looked at me, Reimu? I'm the whole damn package! Enough said!
Not that you're up to my standards, Reimu, but I'm pretty, I'm rich, I've got clout, I'd dominate you in bed, and I've got noble aspirations for the world. Oh, and I'm told I'm also super humble.
Why waste time giving you the sales pitch when you can see the worth of the product for yourself? I mean, fuck, look at me, girl! I'm perfect!
Well, there's obviously a reason I'm called the Almighty Nagamimi, right? I should be asking you why I should bother marrying you!
Gee, really?! Wow, that's incredible! What's next, a six ace king high? A house full of straights?
Yeah, I do: me and my useless ass subordinates. I swear, it's a rare day that goes by when I don't contemplate tossing one of them out my office window.
Well, I wouldn't say Julietta and I never get along. There's just more moments I feel like socking him in the face than moments I don't!

Gotta say, not a fan of that egghead, Silas, that I work with. Always with that smarmy grin, dumb goggles, and stupid haircut...I swear, he really reminds me of a rooster. Yeah, a real "cock" alright.

Oh, boy, don't even get me started on my boss, Allie. Truly an insufferable witch with a sadistic streak. If she wasn't humanity's best hope at survival, I probably would've choked her out more times than I could count.
Can't say I get along with Mio, a fellow navigator we recently took on at Nodens. She's just so damn useless! Maybe if she could learn to keep up with me...
Not to toot my own horn, but I am a pretty decent cook! Tasty little bento boxes are my specialty.

You may not think it, but I'm not a bad cook! Hell, even before I got this human form I could handle myself well in the kitchen. And that's no small feat considering my size and lack of opposable thumbs.
Can't blame luck for everything, Kyou! I'm sure at least part of it was a major lack of skill on your part.
Here's a prediction: you're definitely gonna regret playing against me in another round or two. Didn't even need a Fortuner for that one!
Hey, no sweat! You did your best! ...of course, your best wasn't very good, now, was it? Eeheehee!
No worries, Kyou, there's always next time! Though, of course, I may want more than just a view of the show for my next win...
The power to obliterate and ressurect dragons! I'd kill 'em all, then raise 'em back up just to kill 'em again! It'd never get old!
A wish, huh? Hmm...I'd just wish that dragons never existed. So much carnage, so much death. To undo that all in an instant, I'd...
I'm liking where this is going...
Ooh, hiding one somewhere naughty, are we? Don't tell me where yet! I want it to be a surprise...
Piercings, huh? Don't think I'd ever get one; wouldn't really suit me. But on you...
If I guess where it is will you let me give it a lil' tug later? Eeheehee!
Hey, Einstein, that'd mean I could see your cards, too! Do you even think before you speak? Or even, like, in general?
Pop any portals in this place, Cyclops, and I'll pop each and every one of your circuits.
Hey, I said no cheating, didn't I?! Can someone get this little twerp out of here?
A portal, huh? As in a two-way dimensional shift that could be looked through from either side? I'm not even gonna bother pointing out the flaw in that plan...
Sure, give it a try, Cyclops. That is, if you wanna get punted straight to the moon.
Yeah, I've seen Agents hack, before, Cyclops. Looks nothing like...whatever you're doing.
Gotta agree with the flying weasel there, Dust. You look like you shoved your head into an ice cream cone and never found your way out!
Oh, no need to feel so insecure, girl! You've got everything I want in just the size I want 'em...
Why're you askin' that? Did someone make fun of your tiny tits? 'Cuz I'll knock their lights out, if ya want.
That's like asking me to choose between bricks of bills or solid gold bars! It's all money to me, babe!
Good question...guess it depends on the size, really. Obnoxiously oversized Titzillas are an automatic "ugh" from me.
I may not look it, but I'm actually pretty good at cooking! Lunch break is always a good time when you can guarentee yourself a good meal.
My bento boxes are pretty damn delicious, if I do say so myself. Rice, egg, chicken, veggies...they're simple, but food just tastes better when you know you made it yourself, ya know?
Oh, no, absolutely not. Blowing off a contest to shlick it with a bunch of degenerates is definitely the wrong call. Then again, I'm here, so maybe that says something about me, too.
Skipping out on an important event to play cards and masturbate with a bunch of weird strangers in a sketchy establishment? I can't imagine how that could possibly be a bad call!
Sure, if you really want, Lyralei! This view's just as good, anyways.
Aw, c'moooon, Lyralei! No need to be ashamed! Small boobs are great, really!
C'moooon, don't be like that, Lyralei! Tiny tits are where it's at, girl! You look way better than any saggy breasted cow out there!
You really don't gotta be like that, Lyralei. Your tits look great! Really!
Oh, I know exactly what I'd want from you, Rosa...
Well, I mean, if you're offering, Rosa...
I'll be sure to take you up on that, Rosa. You can bet on that.
Now, don't make promises you aren't gonna keep, honey...
Big talk, Guzma! Too bad you don't have the skills to back it up.
Well, that better not be true, cowboy. 'Cuz if I catch you cheating at this game there's gonna be an ace up your ass, instead.
Yeah, uh, I highly doubt that, Bobobozo.
Look, I get it, okay? It's a little messy and uneven! I know! Human hair is a bitch to take care of, alright?
Sure, I'll throw my hat in the ring! ~rng(100-1000)~ AZ on me, of course! Any other bet is just throwing your money away!

Honestly, I haven't been human for long so I'm still learning some, myself. Pro tip, though: don't tell your subordinates you need them to stay after hours for some "disciplinary training". They, uh, might get the wrong idea...

Haven't been a human for all that long, so I'm still kind of figuring this stuff out, too. One thing I've found, though: be careful about telling a co-worker that you want to "pet her pussy". I swear, I was just talking about the cats in the cafe! THAT was an HR nightmare...
Free? Accesible!? What're you, insane?! That's no way to run a business or organization!
Yeah, gonna have to pass on that, Wik. I make it a staunch rule to stay far away from things like "donations" and "charities". Just don't believe in them, you see.
Oh, shucks, sorry, I must've left my wallet at home! Rats!
If I throw some cash your way will you shut up already?
Yeah, uh, so I'm a capitalist? Heretical acts like "donations" are strictly against my dogma. Sorry, champ!
